I can't save my changes even if I deny to save the changes and press the cancel
button.
I'm currently running RC2.

- any steps?
- in which editor did you try to save?
- do you run plain 3.0 RC2 or did you install additional plug-ins?
- can you please verify that you run on 3.0 RC2

Looking at the code the only reasons for this could be
- VM / JIT bug
- projection text store's master document being null (this is only set in the
constructor)

I opened a java source file from one of my projects into the default java
editor. I started appending text at one line and then I pressed return. But
nothing visible happened. The cursor didn't move to the next line. Instead there
was garbage in the line where I added the text.
I took a RC2 build and added the p4eclipse because I need this to open my files
to edit them.

can you reproduce this? if so, can you attach more detailed steps and also, test
whether it happens if p4eclipse isn't installed.

Please reopen with steps to reproduce if you see this again using N20050522-0010
or newer.
